message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe you'll find valuable. I'm asking for $118 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product and I'd like to propose a price of $105. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer.  While I'm motivated to sell, $105 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $115?
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I would like to counter with an offer of $110. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.
